#labels howto,installapps
= Introduction =

How to install apps in liveandroid


= Details =

Browse apps:

http://www.cyrket.com/


Install apps:

1. goto console: press ALT+F1

2. change current path: cd /system/app

3. download application: wget http://65.99.230.146/md/1835012/PilotLines.apk

4. goto home: press ALT+F7, you'll see app now. :)
